pages.title: Hello World
pages.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

pages.title: About Me
pages.text: Hello my name is Shinhwa Wang.I come from China, now live and work in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.I like to code and want to know more interesting technical stuff. If you are interested in what I am learning now start from here.I also love English and try to use it in my daily life. As you already know Iâ€™m Chinese and learning English is a tough process for most Chinese people , here is some advise on how I learn English.Over the years Iâ€™ve made so many projects that Iâ€™ve lost the count. In this website you can find some articles on what Iâ€™ve learned.Iâ€™m actively collecting a list of useful resources that I take inspiration from and you can find it here.If youâ€™d like to know more about me, like the projects Iâ€™ve been involved in, check out my Resume and GitHub.I have worked for more than 5 years and it would be pretentious to say Iâ€™ve got all the answers, but I hope youâ€™ll find my experiences and findings useful.I believe in god that everything gets it way and reason, so stay thankful, try to improve gradually and enjoy your life in everyday. Here is my favorite verse, Blessed be the LORD god, the God of Israel, who alone does wonderful deeds.Now Iâ€™ll get back to work on something more meaningful than the about section of my blog. And Iâ€™d suggest you did that too. My Biggest Influences and fav ğŸ’• blogsCS-Notes: The blog made me realize how much more I need to learn. Contact Me â€‹ For general communication, contact shinhwawang2015@gmail.com â€‹ My Wechat id wshpop
